data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jordal, Bjarte H. (2012): Phrixosoma concavifrons – a sexually dimorphic Phrixosomatini (Coleoptera: Curculionidae) from the Udzungwa mountains in Tanzania. Zootaxa 3255: 52-56, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.210941
